

 ```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,results="asis"}
.doc_arg(

    type = "logical",
    description = c(
        "Determines whether the ",
        .doc_ref_self(),
        "becomes a private member of the",
        .doc_r6class(),
        ".",
        "<br>",
        "If `TRUE`, the member is only accessible within the",
        .doc_r6class(),
        "object (e.g., in methods) and not exposed in the public interface.",
        "In this case, ",
        .doc_ref(tag = "declare_active_binding"),
        "and",
        .doc_ref(tag = "declare_method"),
        "will return",
        .doc_value_NULL(),
        ". If `FALSE` (the default), the member is public and can be accessed externally."
    ),
    affected_methods = "^declare_"
)
 ```
